s: April 25, 2022 - Once per month, we feature a Black entrepreneur on our blog and our social media as part of an ongoing effort to amplify awareness for Black-founded brands. t: Moonshot Snacks at the forefront of eco-friendly food innovation
s: October 14, 2023 - Julia Collins: Moonshot is a climate-friendly snack brand; that means we keep the planet in mind with every decision we make, from seed in soil to the end consumer. We've tracked the impact our product and company have at every step of the process and made reductions to emissions where possible.

t: Moonshot went from the first climate-friendly snack brand on the market to a Patagonia partnership in three years. | PlanetFWD
s: Julia Collins founded Moonshot, the first-ever climate-friendly snack brand, in 2019, on a mission to create a healthier planet for her son, Mosi. With over a decade of experience reimaging food systems, she set her sights on tackling the 34% of global emissions that come from food systems ...

t: Why Patagonia Provisions bought Moonshot Snacks
s: January 14, 2025 - Patagonia Provisions, the food and bev arm of outdoor outfitter Patagonia, has acquired snack brand Moonshot for an undisclosed sum.
